landing.greeting1: Do you fear on missing out on the crypto-currency craze, but not enough to want to gamble with your savings? Then give this web-app a try! Here you can safely try investing as much virtual money as you want, and add more money if you go broke!
landing.greeting2: This web-app does not collect any personal information and have no hidden fees, it's just a personal project I put together to exercise my programming skills.
landing.greeting3: To use this app, simply chose a currency and start buying! You start with 1000 virtual USD and can add more by clicking on the menu button in the top right corner. Once you have bought a currency it will you a 'sell' button, click it to sell part of or all of your holding of that currency. More features might be added later.
